workouts.name: Long Walk In The Park
workouts.description: A sustained, moderate-pace walk ideal for endurance and mental clarity.

workouts.name: Beginner Bodyweight Flow
workouts.description: A full-body routine using only your own weight to build foundational muscle strength.

workouts.name: Tree Pose Balance Drill
workouts.description: Focused exercises to improve single-leg stability and core engagement for better fall prevention.

workouts.name: Hill Sprints and Core
workouts.description: Short, intense bursts of uphill running paired with mat work to boost power and abdominal strength.

workouts.name: Recovery Stroll
workouts.description: A gentle, slow-paced walk designed to promote active recovery and reduce muscle soreness.
